snippet: A bipartisan group in the House of Representatives has been meeting sporadically to create a comprehensive immigration bill, but the Senate debate is dwarfing the group’s efforts.
abstract: Bipartisan group in House of Representatives is fast losing its chance to shape immigration debate on Capitol Hill due to comprehensive bill already making its way through Senate Judiciary Committee.
lead_paragraph: A bipartisan group in the House of Representatives has been meeting sporadically to create a comprehensive immigration bill, but the Senate debate is dwarfing the group’s efforts.

headline.seo: House Group Works on Own Version of Immigration Bill
headline.main: In Immigration Bill Talks, House Group Raises Voice
headline.print_headline: In Immigration Bill Talks, House Group Raises Voice
